mapper.select: SELECT admin_id AS adminId, category_id AS categoryId, restaurant_name AS restaurantName , restaurant_address AS restaurantAddress, restaurant_number AS restaurantNumber , business_number AS businessNumber, operating_hours AS operatingHours , restaurant_description AS restaurantDescription, `status` , max_capacity AS maxCapacity, lat, lng, created_at AS createdAt FROM restaurant WHERE restaurant_id = #{restaurantId};
SELECT B.closed_days AS closedDays FROM restaurant A INNER JOIN holiday B ON A.restaurant_id = B.restaurant_id WHERE B.restaurant_id = #{restaurantId}
